entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is mentioned as the one who has a message from Voldemort. He is described as wringing his hands and looking mad.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the one who has sent a message through Severus. He is described as wanting to hunt down Lily Evans.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who is being requested by Snape. He is described as flicking his wand and creating silence in the air.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who has come with a warning/request to Dumbledore. He is described as wringing his hands and looking mad.

entities.name: lily evans
entities.description: Lily Evans is mentioned as the person that Voldemort wants to hunt down. She is described as being related to Snape.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Trelawney is mentioned as the one who made a prophecy/prediction about a boy born at the end of July.

relationships.description: Snape has come with a message from Voldemort. Snape is described as saying 'No — no message — I’m here on my own account!'
Dumbledore is being requested by Snape. Dumbledore is described as flicking his wand and creating silence in the air.
Voldemort wants to hunt down Lily Evans. He is described as thinking that she means something to Snape.
Trelawney made a prophecy/prediction about a boy born at the end of July, which Voldemort is interested in.
Snape is related to Lily Evans. He is described as saying 'he thinks it means her son'.
